name: Time Hopper (TheVoiderling)
description:
You play as Zeke, an alien miner that has to use time travel portals to escape an imminent explosion. Traverse through several puzzle rooms and manipulate your short timer so you can escape, all the while avoiding your past self to prevent a paradox.

Made by Studio [A]void - Available at a.void.game.studio@gmail.com
